name: Flightsafety not guaranteed​
description:
Crash course in plane flying:

keyeffectshiftacceleratectrldeceleratewpitch up
spitch down
aroll left
droll right
qyaw left
eyaw right
ctoggle camera mode (free cam, follow cam)
vreset camera
gtoggle landing gear

Complete your mission and try to keep everyone modestly happy with you.

Based on a historical mission in 1959. As historically accurate as I could make it (aka probably not even close)

So I accidentally made it unwinnable in full screen, but can't fix it before the deadline. You'll have to go into windowed mode to be able to press the end button. Making the mouse invisible was a bad idea in retrospect.
